text: Sonic & Sega All Stars Racing is a video game made by Sumo Digital and published by Sega. The game was released on February 23, 2010 in North America. The game was released in Europe on February 26, 2010, except the United Kingdom. The game is available on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, PC, and Wii. It was not released in the United Kingdom for unknown reasons. A Nintendo DS version was planned, but was cancelled for unknown reasons. The Wii version can be played on the Wii U.WebCite query result ==References== Category:2010 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Gameloft games Category:IOS games Category:Kart racing video games Category:MacOS games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Racing video games Category:Sega arcade games Category:Sega video games Category:Sonic the Hedgehog spin-off games Category:Wii games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games
title: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing
